title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: SUI Surges 13.7% as Index Trades Higher from Thursday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) joined Sui (SUI) as a top performer, rising 7.1%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2774.43, up 1.5% (+40.48) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

Eighteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SUI (+13.7%) and BCH (+7.1%).

Laggards: POL (-1.9%) and ADA (-0.5%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading higher with 18 of 20 assets up, led by significant gains in SUI (+13.7%) and BCH (+7.1%).
